website_summaries.verdict: The Phiaton Chord MS 530 is a Bluetooth headphone pair and a noise canceling pair, though it's far better at its first job than its second.
pros: Clean, powerful audio performance with deep lows and crisp highs
Active noise cancellation and Bluetooth audio streaming
Can be used with cable in passive mode
cons: Sculpted sound signature won't appeal to purists

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and construction. Average sound. Non-existent noise cancelling that, when activated, muddles the music to the point it sounds like you're under water. But what absolutely kills these headphones is the sound leakage. You can't turn the volume up past about a "3" before anyone with five feet of you can hear everything coming out of the phones. Even if these were the absolute best sounding cans with the best active noise cancelling available, the leakage is unacceptable and is deal-breaker. There is no way these are usable on an airplane without disturbing other passengers. These are being returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gorf Denroh

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad headphones but not quite right for me. They actually sound great but the anc is pretty weak and they don't isolate at all. Leakage out of the earcups is substantial and I wouldn't recommend them for environments that require no bleed. The controls are not very intuitive and although they seem fairly substantial and built well the design is too over the top. I ended up with the Paww soundwave 3 ($20 more) but way better in my opinion. They are a bit heavier but sound great and isolate much better. Non compensated review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived way faster than last order. I prefer the touch control ones that come in pink. But my partner likes these with the buttons much more. He loves how they connect from his phone and laptop to work computer seamlessly too. Says the noise canceling is audible depending on the music you listen to, but otherwise all works great. Hoping they don’t randomly stop working like the last pair
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Made for a big head, fit me perfect but dont fit a few of my friends. It's their older model, but still works great. Bluetooth pairs with my phone and computer easily. Haven't had an overheating problem like I read in other reviews. The noise cancelling isnt the greatest, blocks out ambient noises but can still hear chit chat. Really like that it works via bluetooth or aux cord. The battery life is very long so I forget to charge it, having the additional aux option prevents the long wait for the recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Philbert

customer_reviews.title: excellent connection. Sound not the best but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent connection. Sound not the best but it is good. Controls are very good. Comfortable. Look cool. Battery is fantastic! Lasts 3-4 days. When I go into a bar everyone wants to know what I am listening to and what are those headphones! Its Bluetooth 4 LE so it works really well. I can actually move to different floors from my phone and still works perfectly. No skips. For someone who listens to music all the time, these are essential!
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: but I find wearing it comfortable enough for hours at a time
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy, but I find wearing it comfortable enough for hours at a time, and I have a very large head. The pads can get a bit sweaty, but they are secure enough for brisk walking and moving around. Sound quality is quite good, and noise reduction is also excellent. I rate them superior to all the Bose models because they are cordless, although the Bose seem a bit more bass-heavy. Battery life is excellent as well, with 10 hours on a charge being typical for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: P. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, but they don't last
customer_reviews.text: Purchased June 2014 for $299. After one year of about twice per week usage, they started disconnecting from bluetooth and/or powering off when I'd take them off and go to put them back on again. I called and they sent me a replacement. Now again after about another year (Sept 2016), the same issue is occurring with the new pair they sent, but now many times they won't power back on unless I hold them a certain way.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The Noise Cancelling on these really hurt the quality of sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good until you turn on the ANC, then there's a huge spike in the mids. I've also noticed a little bit of distoriton/static when connecting via bluetooth with my iPhone and computer. The Phiaton BT 330 NC are a much better buy. The sound quality is a little better but when you turn on the ANC there is NO loss of quality, if anything it improves slightly.
customer_reviews.author: MacStevenXIII

customer_reviews.title: THE SOUND IS VERY GOOD, THE NOISE CANCELLING IS VERY GOOD TOO
customer_reviews.text: THE SOUND IS VERY GOOD, THE NOISE CANCELLING IS VERY GOOD TOO, I TRAVEL A LOT AND ITS GREAT, AS SOON YOU TURN THE NOISE CANCELING ON, THE TURBINE DISAPPEAR, THE DESING LOOK GOOD BUT THER IS A PROBLEM, THE BLACK PLASTIC BROKE BECUSE THE DESIGN IS WEAK, ITS A VER SAD THING FOR A NICE DESIGNE AND GREAT FEATURES. IT BROKES AT THE SECOND MONTH. BUT I THINK PHIATON NOTICES IT BECAUSE THE NEW HEADPHONES BT460 HAS FIX THAT DEFECT
customer_reviews.author: Claude Arce

customer_reviews.title: Good sound...Not so comfy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on these headphones was great and well rounded Both with NC on and off. However i wear my headphones almost all day at work so i need something really comfortable. The on ear design i found only comfortable for about 30-45min and then they started to hurt my ears quite a bit. I returned them to get the sony md1r's they are a over ear that is much more comfortable aswell as equal or better sound quality. although they are only offered with either bluetooth or nc not both together. however i am happy now with my nc sony head phones also these headphones like most on or over ear do get hot after a bit.
customer_reviews.author: David Klimavich

customer_reviews.title: Its a keeper for me
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. I was concerned as I didn't think I'd like an on-ear device, but all the various earbuds would not stay in. I wear this several hours a day and use it for phone and music. The noise canceling is ok but not great. Easy to use, easy to pair. May be a little heavy for some folks.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteTransplant

customer_reviews.title: Great design, Brilliant sound
customer_reviews.text: Great design, Brilliant sound, as good as it gets in wireless. Beats the" Beats", hands down, in sound quality. You cant go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Pendous

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in June 2014, for around $220. Unfortunately the build quality isn't great, one of the headphone sliders is loose and the right earphone has a bad connection - depending on I wiggle the left side, sound on the right breaks in and out. Sent a question to support but no response. 2 stars because the sound quality & noise cancelled was decent while they lasted, even if I found them too heavy and made for larger size heads. Now I wish I'd put that money towards a Bose...
customer_reviews.author: jchoo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best options among Bluetooth headphones at the moment.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best options among Bluetooth headphones at the moment. I was hesitant to buy due to the unknown brand — the company claims to be for 50 years on the market, or something like that , but there's no even a Wikipedia article about them. But after all the headphones turned out to be great. Bluetooth v4.0 with all the latest profiles. Very good battery life. Wired playback works perfectly. I also quite like the design. No NFS, but I personally do not care about that. What could be improved is the annoying blue flashing light.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Janusov

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product & Price
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great. It has all of the functionality you would need and want in a headset. It's a steal at this price. It rivals any of the headsets I've seen for $300+. I completely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: pmgriffith

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great microphone and battery life - I use them for conference calls primarily and to listen to music when traveling. They are awesome. Highly recommend them if you are looking for a great microphone and a good bluetooth speaker set. Noise canceling is good - comparable to any other headset I have tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Phleo

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of noise cancelling earbuds and I purchased the headphones as a Christmas gift for a family member. I based my decision solely on the performance from my earbuds and was not disappointed. The earphones worked better then expected and the recipient was absolutely thrilled with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine sounded terrible. Manufacturing defect?
customer_reviews.text: Sounded muffled and Muddy from three sources, wired and BT. Maybe I got one that was wired incorrectly? No response from manufacturer. Seller courteously refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: Ho'okele. I take reviews seriously! I am not paid.Peeps are getting bogus reviews..

customer_reviews.title: Fine mid class headphone
customer_reviews.text: Pro: the build quality, accessories are fantastic. As for the sound quality, it's fine, thought I expected more details. However the sound signature is wounderful ,which similar to the my focal spirit pro, pretty neutral sounding for its price . Con: noticeable background noise in bluetooth mode even when noise cancelling is off.
customer_reviews.author: LIN, HC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. I initially thought they were lackluster
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. I initially thought they were lackluster, but that was because I was focusing on hip-hop, once I switched over to listening to less bass forward music that had more complexity and subtlety they stood out and were phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Deamos

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amassing for wireless headphone!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is amassing for wireless headphone! No static noise while using it. Seems light weight. Nice construction and nice color.
customer_reviews.author: RNMikaele1991

customer_reviews.title: These on-ear headphones slip out of place when moving around and can be easily heard when someone else is wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these along with the Beats Studio Wireless for a personal comparison. It didn't take more than a minute to make my decision, I went with the Beats. Although the price is higher, I believe its worth it. These on-ear headphones slip out of place when moving around and can be easily heard when someone else is wearing them. If you want wireless headphones, go with the Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!  High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby LOVES his Xmas gift! He has a trucking business. These are perfect for him!!!! The blue tooth connection is seemless. Have a diff pair that require too many steps to connect.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Hurt my ears so badly, very heavy, sound was ok, then on day 5 one headphone stopped working. For the price I expected much better.
customer_reviews.author: RST

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. And the mic is very clear. I use it for conference calls in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Comfortable on the ears. Great for walking in Chicago during this bitterly cold weather. Keeps my ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great head phones
customer_reviews.text: Great head phones, tried it in plane and the noise cancelling is very good, sound quality is excellent for music and movie. Pairs easily with any BT device, battery life is quite good, charges fast.
customer_reviews.author: farbod hadad

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth doesn't work after 4 moths!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware, It sounds very good, but it is poorly made! the bluetooth function doesn't work after just 4 months from purchase date! I have contacted the support and they told me to try and reset the headset but with no luck, they told me i should send it back to them.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah AlHamad

customer_reviews.title: Good: great overall sounds
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this makes my jaw lock.. Maybe all headphones does that? Or mabe it's the tightness of headphones. Good: great overall sounds, and the sorroung isn't bad. Negative: walking with a friend and we were 5 ft apart, I have the phone and he has the Phiaton ..the sounds starts to break a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Happy :)

customer_reviews.title: look good, bluetooth very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: look good, bluetooth very easy to use. as other reviews noise cancelling good but not as good as the BOSE noise cancelling. Could also do with a sturdier carry case than the bag provided. Otherwise very happy with purchase and would highly recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Darren norman

customer_reviews.title: Feels Cheap, My pair was defective. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Headphone arrived and only play music out of one ear. I've reset the to factory settings and followed the troubleshooting guide. Must be defective. I was surprised at how cheap the quality feels. Though I like the design, the parts are all plastic. These are not $250 worth of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McCaslin

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Disconnects as soon as the music play. Tried charging for 24 hours , didn't help. Email support is advertised but nobody responds. Will try my luck with their phone support.
customer_reviews.author: Infinite Loop

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headphones I ever used! clear sound, comfortable and well built! decent wireless range and no sound degradation when using BT.
customer_reviews.author: ronitau

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new head phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old son for his birthday. He just loves them. He says they are very comfortable and the sound is awesome. He is on his computer all day long playing mine craft with his friends or watching videos. He also loves that he can move around. My only complaint is that it is now it is impossible to get his attention for anything. :)
customer_reviews.author: Bruzer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and functionality; Too Hot
customer_reviews.text: The headphones get hot pretty quickly when wireless and noise cancelling are on. Otherwise the sound and functionality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Sound is pretty good. Only problem is comfort during long term wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Lua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent head phone
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to choose and order this device on Amazon. The whole ordering and delivery process was transparent and everything ran flawlessly. The shipment to Hungary took 2 weeks inclduding the customs. The head phone fulfilled all my expectations. Pairing with my Blackberry Torch was easy, the sound quality is excellent and all functions I need are working fine (listening music, taking and initiating phone calls etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Ferenc Otvos

customer_reviews.title: They look good, but are uncomfortable and don't sound good
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing headphones. They look good, but are uncomfortable and don't sound good. The noise cancellation is poor (in comparison to cheaper Audio-Technica ATH-ANC7B headphones or equally expensive Bose). Sonically, they are poor headphones -- easily bested by much cheaper headphones (such as Sennheiser HD-280 Pros). I ended up returning and bought Bose QC15s (much though I hate Bose) -- they are vastly superior...
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great! a bit of heat on the ears after a couple of hours, so just take a 10 min break :)
customer_reviews.author: Yamen

customer_reviews.title: Integrates well with my lg g2, very efficient with battery use
customer_reviews.text: I use this a headset for business calls as well as listening to music. The sound works great both ways and I have gotten no complaints about the sound from the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Power

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear. Good BT connection with no drops. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: john paul lew

customer_reviews.title: Tired of cables catching on seat
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I fly every week and more and more have to fly on regional (noisy) aircraft. Got tired of constantly catching the cable from my Bose. Should have tried them out first because they are really uncomfortable to my ear after about an hour. Really disappointed because sound and everything else is good. I guess I will have to try to find a truly around the ear design since these are large but over the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Savy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have just had airport burritos
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the long flights. A little bit on the heavy-side, but otherwise fairly comfortable. I would have given it a 5 star except for the fact that the noise-cancelling works too well. Yes I said too well. Just when you think you have let off a silent one, to your horror and embarrassment you realize it was loud enough for everyone to hear it , except yourself.
customer_reviews.author: rroy

product_meta.title: Phiaton Chord MS 530 M-Series Wireless & Active Noise Cancelling Headphones with Microphone
feature_bullets: ANC: On Ear Headphones with Active Noise Cancelling technology cancels ambient noise by up to 98%.
Keep Going: Everplay-X technology allows you to continue calling or listening to your music, even if the battery runs out or your audio device is not Bluetooth compatible (via supplied cable)
Double the Fun: Multipoint connection connects two devices at the same time
Long Battery Life: The MS Chord 530 provides up to 30 Hours of Talk/Music time or 18 Hours of Talk/Music time with Noise Cancelling turned on

WARRANTY: Continue to enjoy your bluetooth wireless device long after the Amazon return period expires. All Phiaton bluetooth wireless products come with a One Year Warranty and we stand behind all of our products with a US based customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars95 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
